localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Checkbox_Tooltip_Opt: This property is optional. Check or uncheck this checkbox to include or exclude it from the object.

localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_Error: The value is invalid for unknown reasons.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_FailsAllRestri: The value does not meet the criteria of any of these sets of restrictions:
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_FailsThisRestr: The value does not meet the criteria of these restrictions:
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_TypeError: The value has the wrong type.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NotABoolean: The value must be a boolean.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NotANumber: The value must be a number.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NotAString: The value must be a string.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NotAnObject: The value must be an object.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NotAnArray: The value must be an array.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NumberNotMulti: The value must be a multiple of {1}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NumberNotInteg: The value must be an integer.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_NumberNotFinit: The value must be finite and not NaN.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringTooShort: The value must be at least {1} characters long. Current length is {2}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringTooLong: The value must not be longer than {1} characters. Current length is {2}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringDoesNotM: The value must match these regular expressions: {1}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringNotDateT: The value must be a valid date and time according to the ISO 8601 format.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringNotTimes: The value must be a valid duration according to the ISO 8601 format.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringNotEmail: The value must be a valid email address.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringNotHostn: The value must be a valid hostname.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringNotIPv4: The value must be a valid IPv4 address.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringNotIPv6: The value must be a valid IPv6 address.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_StringNotURI: The value must be a valid URI.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ObjectHasTooFe: The value must have at least {1} properties. Current number of properties is {2}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ObjectHasTooMa: The value must have no more than {1} properties. Current number of properties is {2}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ObjectIsMissin: The value is missing the required property "{1}".
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ObjectContains: "{1}" is not a valid property name.
The value of property "{1}" is not valid.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ObjectHasInval: The value has inherited properties, which is not allowed. Only values with a native object prototype are permitted.
The value has triggered a dependency in the JSON schema in such a way that no object can ever be valid for this schema.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ArrayHasTooFew: The value must have at least {1} items. Current number of items is {2}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ArrayHasTooMan: The value must have no more than {1} items. Current number of items is {2}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ArrayContainsI: The value of the item at index {1} is not valid.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ArrayContainsD: The value must only contain unique items. Currently, the values at these indexes are duplicates: {1}.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_ArrayHasInvali: The value has inherited properties, which is not allowed. Only values with a native array prototype are permitted.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_EnumValueNotAM: The value is not a member of the enumeration.
localizedText.Helpers_JsonEditors_Error_OptionalTempor: The value is required because of dependencies in the JSON schema.
